    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(int index,
              org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position,
              SkinningData.VertexSkinData skinningData)
        Vertex object represents one Vertex point on collada model object.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of this vertex. Running number on model.
        position - Vertex position in three dimensional space.
        weightsData - Weight values with different joints.

    • Method Detail

      • getSkinData

        public SkinningData.VertexSkinData getSkinData()
        Method used to receive skinning data of this vertex.
        Returns:
        Skinning data.

      • addTangent

        public void addTangent(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f tangent)
        Method used to add this vertex new tangent vector.
        Parameters:
        tangent - Vector to be added.

      • averageTangents

        public void averageTangents()
        Updates average tangent using current tangent vectors.

      • getAverageTangent

        public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getAverageTangent()
        Used to receive current average tangent. To update average tangent, see averageTangents();
        Returns:
        Averaged tangent vector.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Method to get this vertice's index in the mesh that it belongs to.
        Returns:
        Index of this vertex.

      • getLength

        public float getLength()
        The length of this vertices position vector. In other words, the distance from the origin.
        Returns:
        distance from the origin.

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet()
        Method used to define, if vertex has been applied texture and normal data.
        Returns:
        True, if vertex has texture and index data applied. False otherwise.

      • compareTextureAndNormal

        public boolean compareTextureAndNormal(int textureIndexOther,
                                       int normalIndexOther)
        Check if vertex has given texture and normal indices.
        Parameters:
        textureIndexOther - Texture index to compare with.
        normalIndexOther - Normal index to compare with.
        Returns:
        True if texture and normal indices match, false otherwise.

      • setTextureIndex

        public void setTextureIndex(int textureIndex)
        Method to set this vertex's texture index.
        Parameters:
        textureIndex - Texture index this vector points to.

      • setNormalIndex

        public void setNormalIndex(int normalIndex)
        Method to set this vertex's normal index.
        Parameters:
        normalIndex - Normal index this vector points to.

      • getPosition

        public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getPosition()
        Method to get this vertex's position.
        Returns:
        Position of this vertex.

      • getTextureIndex

        public int getTextureIndex()
        Method to get texture point this vertex refers to.
        Returns:
        Index of texture point this vertex refers to.

      • getNormalIndex

        public int getNormalIndex()
        Method to get normal this vertex refers to.
        Returns:
        Index of normal this vertex refers to.

      • getDuplicateVertex

        public Vertex getDuplicateVertex()
        Method to get this vertex's duplicate vertex. Duplicate vertex share the same location, but has different Texture and Normal data. All vertices that share the same location are stacked using duplicateVertex values.
        Returns:
        Duplicate vertex of this vertex.

      • setDuplicateVertex

        public void setDuplicateVertex(Vertex duplicateVertex)
        Method to set this vertex's duplicate vertex. Duplicate vertex share the same location, but has different Texture and Normal data. All vertices that share the same location are stacked using duplicateVertex values.
        Parameters:
        duplicateVertex - Duplicate vertex to set.
